Job Title: Education Sales Representative

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Sales

Description:
Our client, eMATHinstruction, is a small but rapidly growing online math learning business dedicated to revolutionizing education. We are seeking a motivated and results-driven Sales Representative who will not only excel in selling the innovative math learning platform but also handle all the necessary paperwork and processes tosuccessfully onboard our product into school districts. This role requires a combination of sales expertise, administrative proficiency, and a passion for improving education outcomes.
ResponsibilitiesSales● Identify and pursue new sales opportunities within the education sector,specifically targeting school districts.● Build and maintain a robust sales pipeline through proactive outreach,networking, and relationship-building with key stakeholders.● Conduct product demonstrations and presentations to educators,administrators, and decision-makers to showcase the benefits andfeatures of our math learning platform.
School District Liaison● Serve as the primary point of contact for school districts interested inimplementing our math learning platform.● Develop a deep understanding of the procurement processes andrequirements for selling educational products to school districts.● Navigate the bureaucratic processes of school district procurement,including completing paperwork, obtaining necessary approvals, andmeeting compliance standards.● Cultivate strong relationships with district administrators, curriculumcoordinators, and other decision-makers to facilitate ongoing partnershipsand customer satisfaction.Administrative Duties:● Prepare and submit all necessary paperwork, including contracts,purchase orders, and compliance documentation, to facilitate the salesprocess.● Maintain accurate records of sales activities, customer interactions, andprogress towards sales targets using CRM software.
Customer Service & Support● Serve as a trusted advisor to school district clients, offering guidance andsupport throughout the implementation process and beyond.● Address customer inquiries, concerns, and technical issues in a timely andprofessional manner to ensure high levels of customer satisfaction.● Collaborate with the customer success team to gather feedback fromclients and identify opportunities for product improvement andenhancement.
Qualifications● Proven track record of success in sales, with experience in B2B sales and/orselling to the education sector highly desirable.● Strong understanding of the education landscape, including knowledge of schooldistrict structures, purchasing processes, and curriculum standards.● Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to effectivelyengage and influence diverse stakeholders.● Exceptional organizational skills and attention to detail, with the ability tomanage multiple tasks and deadlines simultaneously.● Self-motivated and resourceful, with a proactive approach to problem-solving andachieving sales targets.Additional Information:● Base salary + commission provided on a 1099.● Flexible work environment.● 100% Remote.● Ability and willingness to travel occasionally is a must.
If you're passionate about education and have a drive to succeed in sales while makinga difference, we want to hear from you!

Experience Level (if available): None
